title: sups
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018030920/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Technical Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018030920/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Technical%20Info) : [Feature Tags](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018030920/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Feature%20Tags) : sups**

'sups' is an [OpenType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018030920/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OpenType) [feature tag](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018030920/http:/typophile.com/wiki/feature%20tag) with the friendly name "Contextual Swash". [Click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018030920/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features_pt.htm#sups) to read the spec from the Microsoft Layout Tag Registry.

**Discussion:**  
 [OpenType Superiors Feature: Why Do Letters and Numbers Have Different Baselines?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018030920/http:/typophile.com/node/16879)
author: paul d hunt
